identity.mission: Create a high-contrast, accessible, and emotionally grounded interface for Sri Lankan farmers. Avoid generic SaaS aesthetics. Prioritize clarity and outdoor visibility.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix 'Swiss Poster' clarity with 'Botanical' warmth.
Emotion First: Every color signals a crop state (Healthy, Risk, Critical).
Content is King: Data must be readable at a glance in bright sunlight.
Zoom In: Use big, bold metrics. Farmers don't have time for tiny text.
Contrast: High contrast is non-negotiable for outdoor use.

headings.usage: Page titles, Card headers, Key Metrics
headings.instructions: Use tight tracking (-0.02em) for large headings. Do not use Inter for headings.

body.instructions: High legibility is key. Use base size 16px minimum for body text.

grid_system.bento_mode: Use 'Tetris' grid logic. Hero card spans 2 cols on tablet. Status cards are 1x1.
grid_system.spacing: Generous padding (p-4 to p-8) inside cards. Gap-4 minimum between elements.

rules: Touch targets must be min 48px height.
No horizontal scrolling for main content.
Important alerts must be at the top.
Bottom navigation for primary app sections.

cards.style: Flat white background with subtle earthy border (border-stone-200).
cards.interaction: Hover: shadow-md and border-primary/50 transition-all duration-300.
cards.status_variant: Use top-border (border-t-4) colored by status (Green/Yellow/Red) for quick scanning.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white rounded-full hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-sm font-semibold tracking-wide.
buttons.secondary: bg-white border-2 border-primary/20 text-primary hover:bg-primary/5 rounded-full font-medium.

charts.style: Minimalist. Remove grid lines if possible or make them very subtle. Use AreaCharts for trends to show 'volume' of data.

navigation.mobile: Fixed bottom bar with labeled icons. High contrast active state.
navigation.desktop: Top sidebar or clean top header.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the main background (#F9F7F2) to give a 'paper' or 'organic' feel.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React. Use stroke-width={1.5} for a clean look. Color them with Primary or Status colors.
visual_enhancers.illustrations: Use the selected photography for Hero sections. Do not use generic 3D graphics.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for all text. Use dark grey (#1C1917) on off-white, never pure black.
accessibility.screen_readers: All images must have alt text. Charts must have summary descriptions.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a tool for farmers. It must be robust, clear, and friendly. Do not make it look like a crypto dashboard.
instructions_to_main_agent.theme_setup: Implement the 'Organic & Earthy' color palette in tailwind.config.js. Set the background to #F9F7F2.
instructions_to_main_agent.font_setup: Import Manrope and Public Sans from Google Fonts. Configure them in tailwind.config.js.
instructions_to_main_agent.component_overrides: Customize Shadcn cards to remove the default heavy shadows and replace with subtle borders. Use the 'status_variant' logic for cards.
instructions_to_main_agent.data_visualization: Use Recharts. Create a custom tooltip that is large and readable. Use 'AreaChart' for NPK trends to show the 'fill' of nutrients.
instructions_to_main_agent.testing: Add data-testid to all buttons, inputs, and cards.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) sparingly, only for overlays.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
